name: Mochi
appearance: Chubby cat with pointy ears, a long tail, and a smug expression.
description: Mochi is lazy, clever, and always looking for the easiest way to get food or attention. Often ends up in places it shouldn't be.

name: Tariq
appearance: Young man with short curly hair, a hoodie, and cargo pants.
description: Tariq is laid-back and observant. He tends to notice things others miss and is usually the calm center when things go wrong around him.

name: Aya
appearance: Teenage girl with long straight hair, wearing a school uniform and headphones.
description: Aya is quiet, artistic, and often seen sketching or daydreaming. She’s expressive in subtle ways and reacts to situations with understated humor.

name: Mr. Blanco
appearance: Middle-aged man with a bald head, a tie, and a coffee mug in hand.
description: Mr. Blanco is a well-meaning but distracted adult who’s often in a rush or slightly confused. Great for office, school, or errand-based scenes.

name: Lena
appearance: Young woman with a ponytail, wearing a hoodie and jeans.
description: Lena is curious and energetic. She's often seen trying new things or getting into funny situations due to her enthusiasm.

name: Max
appearance: Tall man with short messy hair, glasses, and a button-up shirt.
description: Max is a thoughtful, slightly awkward character who tends to overthink simple things. He often plays the straight man in funny scenarios.

name: Abuela Rosa
appearance: Elderly woman with a bun hairstyle, round glasses, and a patterned dress.
description: Abuela Rosa is wise, calm, and always prepared. She’s often the one who quietly solves problems or surprises others with clever tricks.

name: Sam
appearance: Child with short hair, a striped t-shirt, and shorts.
description: Sam is playful and curious, often exploring, asking questions, or causing small, harmless mischief in everyday situations.

name: Nico
appearance: Young man with a cap turned backward, sneakers, and a backpack.
description: Nico is sporty and active, always running late or juggling too many things. He’s expressive and easy to read through body language.

name: Kiki
appearance: Small dog with floppy ears and a big round nose.
description: Kiki is expressive and clever, often stealing the show or unintentionally causing chaos. Great for slapstick or reaction-based panels.

name: Amy
appearance: Young girl with pigtails, a dress with polka dots, and big round shoes.
description: Amy is imaginative and full of questions. She's curious about everything and often leads others into unexpected little adventures.

name: Mom (Elena)
appearance: Woman with shoulder-length hair, wearing a cardigan and slacks
description: Elena is practical, kind, and often multitasking. She’s good at managing chaos but sometimes just wants a moment of peace.

name: Dad (Jorge)
appearance: Man with a beard, a baseball cap, and jeans
description: Jorge is easygoing and supportive, but a little absent-minded. He often tries to help and ends up needing help himself.
